variable.name: CYCLE
variable.description: EXAM CYCLE

variable.name: HU01
variable.description: (1.A) FIRST, PLEASE TELL US WHO IS COMPLETING THIS FORM ? - FRAMINGHAM HEART STUDY (FHS) PARTICIPANT WHOSE NAME IS ABOVE

variable.name: HU02
variable.description: (1.A) FIRST, PLEASE TELL US WHO IS COMPLETING THIS FORM ? - SPOUSE

variable.name: HU03
variable.description: (1.A) FIRST, PLEASE TELL US WHO IS COMPLETING THIS FORM ? - FAMILY MEMBER OTHER THAN SPOUSE

variable.name: HU04
variable.description: (1.A) FIRST, PLEASE TELL US WHO IS COMPLETING THIS FORM ? - FRIEND

variable.name: HU05
variable.description: (1.A) FIRST, PLEASE TELL US WHO IS COMPLETING THIS FORM ? - HEALTH CARE PROVIDER FOR FHS PARTICIPANT

variable.name: HU06
variable.description: (1.A) FIRST, PLEASE TELL US WHO IS COMPLETING THIS FORM ? - OTHER

variable.name: HU07
variable.description: (1.C) HOW LONG HAVE YOU KNOWN THE PARTICIPANT ? - YEARS
variable.value: BOTH HU07 AND HU08 UNKNOWN (8310) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM
HU08 FILLED IN BUT HU07 MISSING/UNKNOWN (4)

variable.name: HU08
variable.description: (1.C) HOW LONG HAVE YOU KNOWN THE PARTICIPANT ? - MONTHS
variable.value: BOTH HU07 AND HU08 UNKNOWN (8310) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM
HU07 FILLED IN BUT HU08 MISSING/UNKNOWN (581)

variable.name: HU09
variable.description: (1.D) ARE YOU CURRENTLY LIVING IN THE SAME HOUSEHOLD WITH THE PARTICIPANT ?
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8262) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU10
variable.description: (1.E) HOW OFTEN DID YOU TALK WITH THE PARTICIPANT DURING THE PRIOR 11 MONTHS ? - ALMOST EVERY DAY
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8258) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU100
variable.description: (10) COMPARE YOUR HEALTH TO MOST PEOPLE YOUR OWN AGE. WOULD YOU SAY YOUR HEALTH IS : - WORSE THAN MOST PEOPLE
variable.value: UNKNOWN (887) OR NOT FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU101
variable.description: (10) COMPARE YOUR HEALTH TO MOST PEOPLE YOUR OWN AGE. WOULD YOU SAY YOUR HEALTH IS : - ABOUT THE SAME
variable.value: UNKNOWN (887) OR NOT FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU102
variable.description: (10) COMPARE YOUR HEALTH TO MOST PEOPLE YOUR OWN AGE. WOULD YOU SAY YOUR HEALTH IS : - DON'T KNOW
variable.value: UNKNOWN (887) OR NOT FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU103
variable.description: (3.C) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? OTHER NEUROLOGICAL PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - MEMORY PROBLEMS
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU104
variable.description: (3.C) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? OTHER NEUROLOGICAL PROBLEMS, SUCH AS PARKINSON'S, MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS, SEIZURES, HEAD INJURY
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU105
variable.description: (3.C) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? OTHER NEUROLOGICAL PROBLEMS, SUCH AS HAD AN MRI SCAN OF YOUR HEAD
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU11
variable.description: (1.E) HOW OFTEN DID YOU TALK WITH THE PARTICIPANT DURING THE PRIOR 11 MONTHS ? - SEVERAL TIMES A WEEK
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8258) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU12
variable.description: (1.E) HOW OFTEN DID YOU TALK WITH THE PARTICIPANT DURING THE PRIOR 11 MONTH ? - ONCE A WEEK
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8258) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU13
variable.description: (1.E) HOW OFTEN DID YOU TALK WITH THE PARTICIPANT DURING THE PRIOR 11 MONTH ? - 1 TO 3 TIMES PER MONTH
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8258) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU14
variable.description: (1.E) HOW OFTEN DID YOU TALK WITH THE PARTICIPANT DURING THE PRIOR 11 MONTH ? - LESS THAN ONCE A MONTH
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8258) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU15
variable.description: (1.E) HOW OFTEN DID YOU TALK WITH THE PARTICIPANT DURING THE PRIOR 11 MONTH ? - UNKNOWN / N/A
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8258) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU16
variable.description: HAVE YOU NOTICE THAT HE/SHE HAD ANY MEMORY PROBLEMS OR CHANGE IN PERSONALITY ?
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8261) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM

variable.name: HU17
variable.description: (2.A) HAS THERE BEEN A DIAGNOSIS OF DEMENTIA OR ALZHEIMER'S DISEASE MADE BY A DOCTOR ?
variable.value: UNKNOWN (8261) OR FHS PARTICIPANT COMPLETED THIS FORM
NO OR NOT NOTICED THAT HE/SHE HAD ANY MEMORY PROBLEMS OR CHANGE IN PERSONALITY (HU16 = 0)

variable.name: HU18
variable.description: SINCE THE DATE OF THE LAST FRAMINGHAM HEART STUDY EXAM OR UPDATE ON THE TOP OF PAGE 1, HAVE YOU SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED ?

variable.name: HU19
variable.description: (3.A) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? HEART PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - CHEST PAIN, ANGINA OR ANGINA PECTORIS
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU20
variable.description: (3.A) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? HEART PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - HEART ATTACK OR MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION OR MI
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU21
variable.description: (3.A) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? HEART PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - HEART FAILURE OR CONGESTIVE HEART FAILURE OR CHF
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU22
variable.description: (3.A) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? HEART PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - HEART CATHETERIZATION OR CARDIAC CATHETERIZATION
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU23
variable.description: (3.A) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? HEART PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - HEART BYPASS OPERATION OR CORONARY BYPASS SURGERY OR CABG
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU24
variable.description: (3.A) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? HEART PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - PROCEDURE TO UNBLOCK NARROWED VESSELS TO YOUR HEART MUSCLES (PCTA, CORONARY ANGIOPLASTRY, OR CORONARY STENT)
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU25
variable.description: (3.A) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? HEART PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - OTHER HEART PROBLEM (PACE MAKER, VALVE PROBLEM, AORTA SURGERY, RHYTHM PROBLEM, ATRIAL FIBRILLATION, VENTICULAR TACHYCARDIA)
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU26
variable.description: (3.B) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? CIRCULATORY PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - STROKE, TIA(TRANSIENT ISCHEMIC ATTACK), SUDDEEN PARALYSIS, VISION LOSS, INABILITY TO SPEAK
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU27
variable.description: (3.B) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? CIRCULATORY PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - PROCEDURE TO UNBLOCK NARROWED VESSELS IN YOUR NECK (CAROTID ENDARECTOMY, CAROTID AGIOPLASTRY)
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU28
variable.description: (3.B) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? CIRCULATORY PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - POOR BLOOD CIRCULATION OR BLOCKED OR NARROWED BLOOD VESSELS TO THE LEGS OR FEET, (CLAUDICATION, PERIPHERAL ARTERIAL DISEASE, GANGRENE)
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU29
variable.description: (3.B) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? CIRCULATORY PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - AMPUTATION OF PART OF A LEG OR TOES, BECAUSE OF POOR CIRCULATION OR GANGARENE
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU30
variable.description: (3.B) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? CIRCULATORY PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - BLOOD CLOT OR EMBOLISM IN LEG OR LUNG
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU31
variable.description: (3.B) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? CIRCULATORY PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - OTHER CIRCULATORY PROBLEM
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU32
variable.description: (3.D) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? OTHER PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - CANCER
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU33
variable.description: (3.D) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? OTHER PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - FRACTURE, BROKEN BONE
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU34
variable.description: (3.D) IF YES (TO HU18), DID YOU HAVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS ? OTHER PROBLEMS, SUCH AS - OTHER
variable.value: NO OR HASN'T SEEN A DOCTOR OR BEEN HOSPITALIZED SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE (HU18 = 0)

variable.name: HU35
variable.description: SINCE THE DATE OF YOUR LAST FRAMINGHAM HEART STUDY EXAM OR UPDATE (LHUDATE), HAVE YOU BEEN ADMITTED TO A HOSPITAL OR GONE TO AN EMERGENCY ROOM OR SEEN A PHYSICIAN FOR OTHER THAN A ROUTINE EXAMINATION ?

variable.name: HU39
variable.description: (4.A) IF YES (TO HU35) : "TYPE" PARTICIPANT WAS ADMITTED TO A HOSPITAL OR GONE TO AN EMERGENCY ROOM OR SEEN A PHYSICIAN SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE
variable.value: UNKNOWN (3937) OR PARTICIPANT HASN'T BEEN ADMITTED TO A HOSPITAL OR GONE TO AN EMERGENCY ROOM OR SEEN A PHYSICIAN FOR OTHER THAN A ROUTINE EXAMINATION SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE

variable.name: HU40
variable.description: (4.A) IF YES (TO HU35) : "REASON" PARTICIPANT WAS ADMITTED TO A HOSPITAL OR GONE TO AN EMERGENCY ROOM OR SEEN A PHYSICIAN SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE
variable.value: UNKNOWN (3911) OR PARTICIPANT HASN'T BEEN ADMITTED TO A HOSPITAL OR GONE TO AN EMERGENCY ROOM OR SEEN A PHYSICIAN FOR OTHER THAN A ROUTINE EXAMINATION SINCE LAST FHS EXAM OR UPDATE
STROKE OR TRNSIENT ISCHEMIC ATTACK (TIA), SUDDEN PARALYSIS, VISION LOSS, INABILITY TO SPEAK
